name: Formal name (for set of specifications that include Part 14, MP4 File Format, and Part 2, Visual [encoding]): ISO/IEC 14496. Information technology -- Coding of audio-visual objects. Common name: MPEG-4 file format, version 2, with Visual Coding.
description: Combination of a file format (wrapper) and encoding category (Visual Coding, all profiles).
